code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var brandContent=[{delayAnimation:"0",hoverBg:"#fcf8f4",imgHeight:"85px",imgName:"image-1",title:"Zeplin"},{delayAnimation:"100",hoverBg:"#f3f7fc",imgHeight:"78px",imgName:"image-2",title:"Dropbox"},{delayAnimation:"200",hoverBg:"#f9fcf3",imgHeight:"90px",imgName:"image-3",title:"Shopify"},{delayAnimation:"300",hoverBg:"#f9f9f9",imgHeight:"90px",imgName:"image-4",title:"Slack"},{delayAnimation:"400",hoverBg:"#fdf4fb",imgHeight:"62px",imgName:"image-5",title:"WooCommerce"},{delayAnimation:"500",hoverBg:"#fdf4fb",imgHeight:"77px",imgName:"image-6",title:"InvisionApp"}];var Brand=function Brand(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",style:{"--bs-gutter-y":"2rem"},children:brandContent.map(function(item,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-6 col-md-3 col-lg-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ptf-animated-block","data-aos":"fade","data-aos-delay":item.delayAnimation,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ptf-partner-box",style:{"--ptf-hover-background":item.hoverBg,"--ptf-image-height":item.imgHeight},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ptf-partner-box__image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"assets/img/root/partners/".concat(item.imgName,".png"),alt:"Zeplin",loading:"lazy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"ptf-partner-box__title",children:item.title})]})})},i);})});};export default Brand;
